      • averageUpdaters

        public ParallelWrapper.Builder averageUpdaters(boolean reallyAverage)
        This method enables/disables updaters averaging. Default value: TRUE PLEASE NOTE: This method is suitable for debugging purposes mostly. So don't change default value, unless you're sure why you need it.
        Parameters:
        reallyAverage -
        Returns:

      • prefetchBuffer

        public ParallelWrapper.Builder prefetchBuffer(int size)
        Size of prefetch buffer that will be used for background data prefetching. Usually it's better to keep this value equal to the number of workers. Default value: 2
        Parameters:
        size - 0 to disable prefetching, any positive number
        Returns:

      • useLegacyAveraging

        public ParallelWrapper.Builder useLegacyAveraging(boolean reallyUse)
        If set to true, legacy averaging method is used. This might be used as fallback on multi-gpu systems without P2P access available. Default value: false
        Parameters:
        reallyUse -
        Returns:
